21 #ifndef _Marshalling_hxx
22 #define _Marshalling_hxx
23 
24 #include "ServerHandle.hxx"
25 #include "Instance.hxx"
26 #include "DepthSense-server.hxx"

28 namespace DSI
29 {
30  // This is a class rather than a namespace because autogenerated
31  // code must refer to it via the friend keyword.
32  class Marshalling
33  {
34  template<typename T>
35  struct identity { typedef T type; };
36 
37  public:
38  // This can be used to access the private Instance* member of
39  // generated objects, since they have "friend class
40  // Marshalling" in their declaration.
41  template <class T>
42  static Instance* getInstance (T obj)
43  {
44  return static_cast<Instance*>(static_cast<InstanceBase*>(obj._instance));
45  }
46 
47  template <class T>
48  static int32_t clientMarshal (T obj)
49  {
50  return obj._instance != NULL ? static_cast<Instance*>(static_cast<InstanceBase*>(obj._instance))->oid() : -1;
51  }
52 
54 
55  template <class ImplType, class InterfaceType>
56  static ImplType* standaloneMarshal (InterfaceType obj)
57  {
58  return dynamic_cast<ImplType*>(static_cast<DSI::InstanceBase*>(obj._instance));
59  }
60 
61  template <class InterfaceType, class ImplType>
62  static InterfaceType standaloneUnmarshal (ImplType *obj)
63  {
64  return InterfaceType(static_cast<DSI::InstanceBase*>(obj));
65  }
66 
67  template <class InterfaceType, class ImplType>
68  static InterfaceType standaloneUnmarshalTake (ImplType *obj)
69  {
70  InterfaceType r = standaloneUnmarshal<InterfaceType, ImplType>(obj);
71  obj->decref();
72  return r;
73  }
74 
75  template <class InterfaceType, class ImplType>
76  static std::vector<InterfaceType> standaloneUnmarshal (std::vector<ImplType*> objects)
77  {
78  std::vector<InterfaceType> r;
79 
80  for (typename std::vector<ImplType*>::const_iterator iter = objects.begin(); iter != objects.end(); iter++)
81  r.push_back(standaloneUnmarshal<InterfaceType, ImplType>(*iter));
82 
83  return r;
84  }
85 
86  template <class InterfaceType, class ImplType>
87  static std::vector<InterfaceType> standaloneUnmarshalTake (std::vector<ImplType*> objects)
88  {
89  std::vector<InterfaceType> r;
90 
91  for (typename std::vector<ImplType*>::const_iterator iter = objects.begin(); iter != objects.end(); iter++)
92  r.push_back(standaloneUnmarshalTake<InterfaceType, ImplType>(*iter));
93 
94  return r;
95  }
96 
97  template <class StructType, class ImplType>
98  static std::vector<StructType> standaloneUnmarshalStructs (std::vector<ImplType> structs)
99  {
100  std::vector<StructType> r;
101 
102  for (typename std::vector<ImplType>::const_iterator iter = structs.begin(); iter != structs.end(); iter++)
103  r.push_back((*iter)._standaloneUnmarshal());
104 
105  return r;
106  }
107 
109 
110  template <class T>
111  static T clientUnmarshal (Client *client, ServerHandle handle, DepthSense::Type (*typeFactory) (int32_t typeID))
112  {
113  // Trick to be able to specialize this member inside this header file
114  return clientUnmarshal(client, handle, typeFactory, identity<T>());
115  }
116 
117  static DepthSense::Context getContext (Client* client)
118  {
119  return DepthSense::Context(client->getInstance(client->getContext(), DepthSense::Context::type()));
120  }
121 
123 
124  private:
125 
126  template <class T>
127  static T clientUnmarshal (Client *client, ServerHandle handle, DepthSense::Type (*typeFactory) (int32_t typeID), identity<T>)
128  {
129  // Client::getInstance() does not increment the expose count (neither locally on the client side nor on the server side)
130  Instance* instance = client->getInstance(handle.oid, typeFactory(handle.typeID));
131  // FIXME add T::take(void*) which does not increment the refcount
132  // and use it here
133 #ifdef INSTANCE_DEBUG
134  instance->incrementLocalExposeCount(); // the expose count has been incremented on the server side (before calling clientUnmarshal), so let's do the same locally on the client side
135 #endif // INSTANCE_DEBUG
136  T r(static_cast<DSI::InstanceBase*>(instance)); // the expose count is incremented here both locally on the client side and on the server side
137  instance->decref(); // this method is not supposed to increment the expose count on the server side
138 
139  return r;
140  }
141 
142  static DepthSense::Context clientUnmarshal (Client *client, ServerHandle handle, DepthSense::Type (*typeFactory) (int32_t typeID), identity<DepthSense::Context>)
143  {
144  // Client::getInstance() does not increment the expose count (neither locally on the client side nor on the server side)
145  Instance* instance = client->getInstance(handle.oid, typeFactory(handle.typeID));
146  // FIXME add T::take(void*) which does not increment the refcount
147  // and use it here
148 
149  instance->localIncref();
150 
151  DepthSense::Context r(static_cast<DSI::InstanceBase*>(instance)); // the expose count is incremented here both locally on the client side and on the server side
152  instance->decref(); // this method is not supposed to increment the expose count on the server side
153 
154  return r;
155  }
156 
157  static DepthSense::Interface clientUnmarshal (Client *client, ServerHandle handle, DepthSense::Type (*typeFactory) (int32_t typeID), identity<DepthSense::Interface>)
158  {
159  // Client::getInstance() does not increment the expose count (neither locally on the client side nor on the server side)
160  Instance* instance = client->getInstance(handle.oid, typeFactory(handle.typeID));
161  // FIXME add T::take(void*) which does not increment the refcount
162  // and use it here
163 
164  // ugly hack, but once we have a ContextInstance derived class we can get rid of this
165  if (instance->type() == DepthSense::Context::type())
166  {
167  instance->localIncref();
168  }
169 #ifdef INSTANCE_DEBUG
170  else
171  {
172  instance->incrementLocalExposeCount(); // the expose count has been incremented on the server side (before calling clientUnmarshal), so let's do the same locally on the client side
173  }
174 #endif // INSTANCE_DEBUG
175 
176  DepthSense::Interface r(static_cast<DSI::InstanceBase*>(instance)); // the expose count is incremented here both locally on the client side and on the server side
177  instance->decref(); // this method is not supposed to increment the expose count on the server side
178 
179  return r;
180  }
181 
182  };
183 }
184 
185 #endif
